MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Kirkfieldbank, affecting properties in Clydesholm Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:49pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:09pm on 10th November 2020.
